article_text:
Hillary Clinton’s recent poll troubles have “led to another bout of a contagious pundit malady,” observes David Weigel, who recently rejoined the Washington Post. “That would be Bidenmania.” Not to be confused with Beatlemania.

To be sure, Weigel overstates the contagion. “On CNN, Chris Cuomo and Jeff Zeleny took turns asking whether Vice President Joe Biden would be tempted to enter the race,” he notes. He also cites tweets from...

twitter.description: Best of the Web: He would make the Democratic primaries less grim, James Taranto writes.
twitter.title: ‘Bidenmania’
